hayi: Umsebenzisi onengqondo obuyisela umva ixabiso lenyani lentetho
kwaye: Umsebenzisi onengqondo, yinyani kuphela ukuba zombini izivakalisi ziyinyani
okanye: Umsebenzisi onengqondo, yinyani ukuba ubuncinci intetho enye iyinyani
xor: Kukodwa OKANYE, yinyani ukuba ibinzana elinye liyinyaniso
itafile inyaniso: Itheyibhile ebonisa imveliso yazo zonke iindibaniselwano zamagalelo kwintetho ye boolean
de Morgan imithetho: Imigaqo yokulawula amabinzana e boolean nge NOT, KUNYE, kunye OKANYE
ingxelo enemiqathango: Ilawula ukuphunyezwa kwekhowudi ngokusekelwe ekubeni imeko iyinyani
nand: HAYI kwaye - yinyani kuphela ukuba zombini iintetho bubuxoki
nokuba: AYIKHO okanye - yinyani kuphela ukuba zombini ezi ntetho bubuxoki
I-algebra ye-boolean: Inkqubo yemathematika esetyenziselwa ukwenza umzekelo kunye nokuhlalutya ingqiqo ye-boolean
